summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented: the ResumeEditor placeholder is replaced with an editable form (title, personal info, summary) and save/cancel actions, and the page uses useGetResume/useUpdateResume from useResumes for offline-first persistence and sync. Some additional behavior changes in useResumes (e.g., resume list merging logic and query staleness tweaks) and toast notifications were introduced beyond the explicit request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added toast-based success/error notifications on save in the Resume Editor UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for toast notifications; it only requires editing and saving functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed resume list loading/merging behavior to build a backend resume map, merge backend resumes, and append only local-only resumes (id starts with 'local_') when authenticated.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on the Resume Editor wiring; it does not request changes to dashboard list merge semantics.

hallucinated_features.description: Adjusted resume query freshness behavior by explicitly setting staleTime: 0 for useGetResume to avoid briefly showing stale data.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested in REQ-1/REQ-2; it is an additional query-behavior change.
